properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 1 at 3:22AM AKST until March 2 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occurring. Plan on difficult travel
conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches are
expected south of Trims Camp, with 2 to 5 inches of snow are
expected north of Trims Camp. South winds gusting to 65 mph
along with blowing snow are expected through this morning from
Black Rapids north.

* WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to continue through
Monday. South winds gusting to 65 mph and blowing snow are
expected to continue through this morning. After winds decrease
this afternoon, winds will turn north.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The
latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST MONDAY
